verses.roman:
ei māgha-saṅkrāntye tumi randhana karilā
nānā vyañjana, kṣīra, piṭhā, pāyasa rāndhilā

synonyms: ei—this; māgha-saṅkrāntye—on the occasion of the Māgha-saṅkrānti festival; tumi—you; randhana karilā—cooked; nānā vyañjana—varieties of vegetables; kṣīra—condensed milk; piṭhā—cakes; pāyasa—sweet rice; rāndhilā—cooked.
translation: "During the last Māgha-saṅkrānti festival, you cooked varieties of vegetables, condensed milk, cakes and sweet rice for Me.
